entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening then changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
